line.token: * This file is part of Composer.
* For the full copyright and license information, please view the LICENSE
* file that was distributed with this source code.
* @phpstan-type Attributes array{retryAuthFailure: bool, redirects: int, retries: int, storeAuth: bool}

* @phpstan-type Job array{url: string, origin: string, attributes: Attributes, options: mixed[], progress: mixed[], curlHandle: resource, filename: string|null, headerHandle: resource, bodyHandle: resource, resolve: callable, reject: callable}
'The passed-in handle is not a valid CURLM handle.'
"An easy handle was not good/valid. It could mean that it isn't an easy handle at all, or possibly that the handle already is in used by this or another multi handle."
'This can only be returned if libcurl bugs. Please report it to us!'
* @param array{retryAuthFailure?: bool, redirects?: int, retries?: int, storeAuth?: bool} $attributes
// set defaults in a PHPStan-happy way (array_merge is not well supported)
// check URL can be accessed (i.e. is not insecure), but allow insecure Packagist calls to $hashed providers as file integrity is verified with sha256
'Failed to open a temp stream to store curl headers'
'" file could not be written to '
// let cURL set the Accept-Encoding header to what it supports
// Always set CURLOPT_PROXY to enable/disable proxy handling
// Any proxy authorization is included in the proxy url
// Curl needs certificate locations for secure proxies.
'Connecting to a secure proxy using curl is not supported on PHP versions below 7.3.0.'
// sleep in case select returns -1 as it can happen on old php versions or some platforms where curl does not manage to do the select

'<warning>A connection timeout was encountered. If you intend to run Composer without connecting to the internet, run the command again prefixed with COMPOSER_DISABLE_NETWORK=1 to make Composer run in offline mode.</warning>'
'Received unexpected http status code 0 without error for '
// handle 3xx redirects, 304 Not Modified is excluded
// fail 4xx and 5xx responses and capture the response
// Compare max_file_size with the content-length header this value will be -1 until the header is parsed
'Maximum allowed download size reached. Content-length header indicates '
// Compare max_file_size with the download size in bytes
// Replace path using hostname as an anchor.
// This actually differs from PHP which seems to add duplicate slashes.
'" file could not be downloaded, got redirect without Location ('
// check for bitbucket login page asking to authenticate
'Bitbucket requires authentication and it was not provided'
// check for gitlab 404 when downloading archives
'GitLab requires authentication and it was not provided'
* @param array{retryAuthFailure?: bool, redirects?: int, storeAuth?: bool} $attributes
